LanguageData.RT_TigerE_Vehicle.label: Tiger E
LanguageData.RT_TigerE_Vehicle.description:
A super heavy tank with strongest cannon and armor that could beat any enemy easily, but with extra low speed and really hard to repair.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x3, MG Gunner x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
155mm (Main cannon)
7.62x54mm (Hull and Coaxial MG)
